jojo_ripples.skill.cringe.desc: Deal emotional damage to your opponent
jojo_ripples.skill.hp_doxx.desc: Exposes the target location into a map
jojo_ripples.skill.hp_target.desc: Opens a menu that let you select an specific target to use the spirit divination
jojo_ripples.skill.hp_block.desc: Holding it protects you from any damage that isn't a projectile
